channel.title: Resource for PC and Video Game Enthusiasts
channel.description:
Hey all.
I'm not sure this is allowed here (if not, I sincerely apologize and will humbly bow out of this thread), but I've developed a website that I hope will come to be a valuable resource for PC and video gaming enthusiasts.
That said, 90% of the content on the website is going to be user-generated articles, reviews, tech guides, and so forth. However, unlike sites like Metacritic where anyone can upload pretty much anything, I plan on editing and formatting each article to at least give it the appearance of a professional article (content aside).
With that in mind, I figured this would be a great place to have folks submit their content, as I'm sure a large majority of you are into PC gaming at the very least.
If you want to contribute or just check it out: [url='https://www.pcbattlestation.com']PCBattleStation[/url]. At the very least, I suggest signing up for the forums and entering the giveaway contest--just post a pic of your computer rig/battle station.
Thanks!

item.title: Resource for PC and Video Game Enthusiasts
item.dc:creator: Gunsrequiem
item.description:
Hey all.

I’m not sure this is allowed here (if not, I sincerely apologize and will humbly bow out of this thread), but I’ve developed a website that I hope will come to be a valuable resource for PC and video gaming enthusiasts.

That said, 90% of the content on the website is going to be user-generated articles, reviews, tech guides, and so forth. However, unlike sites like Metacritic where anyone can upload pretty much anything, I plan on editing and formatting each article to at least give it the appearance of a professional article (content aside).

With that in mind, I figured this would be a great place to have folks submit their content, as I’m sure a large majority of you are into PC gaming at the very least.

If you want to contribute or just check it out: PCBattleStation. At the very least, I suggest signing up for the forums and entering the giveaway contest–just post a pic of your computer rig/battle station.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Resource for PC and Video Game Enthusiasts
